channel.title: German version of the Orange box engine...
channel.description:
Ok im afraid that i will have not much fun playing Black Mesa when it comes out because my version of Half life Episode 2 is cut... :meh: That means:
-blood has a gray colour -deactivated ragdoll effects -enemys fade away after you kill em
When i play mods for Half life 2 that use the orange box engine, the mods seem to use my Episode 2 settings which means the enemys still fade away and i have gray blood. Im afraid that the same thing will happen to Black Mesa. Does anyone know what i can do to keep the enemys from fading away? Ive already set "g_ragdoll_lvfadespeed" to 0, and they wont fade away anymore after i kill them but the game will crash a lot.

item.title: German version of the Orange box engine...
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
nietzschesaurus:

I hate living in america, but at least we get to keep our rape and gore intact.

edit: sometimes we even get gore-rape.

Come to Belgium, you’ll like it here. Well, maybe not.

Shit, I’ve forgotten to post the link. :fffuuu:

you don’t even need to download that, just extract the files, that are in the LW gcf, out of the other GCF files and done

item.title: German version of the Orange box engine...
item.dc:creator: Xenomorphlover
item.description:
Steppenwolf:

As far as I know, mods are only cut if Episode 2 is a requirement. But since Black Mesa runs on any Source Engine game, it should not use the cut Episode 2 content.

I hope that is true. A censored “Black Mesa” is really no fun…

Read full topic
item.source: German version of the Orange box engine...

item.title: German version of the Orange box engine...
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
I had the same thought about my uncut version of Episode Two, so I started to search a bloodpatch and I found a good one which works quite well. I’ll search the site I got it from and then I’ll post the link…

Edit: Alright, I found the site I downloaded the patch from. It’s a german website, you just have to click on the link named “Hl2: Episode 2 Uncut Patch”. I hope I could help. Have fun.

Read full topic
